Title: [G-13] Public functions not called by the contract should be declared external instead
Content:
[G-13] Public functions not called by the contract should be declared external instead

Contracts are allowed to override their parentsâ€™ functions and change the visibility from external to public and can save gas by doing so.

withdraw

  • Pool.sol#L44

  • Pool.sol#L58

totalSupply
